text:
There are some errors in the list of bugs fixed for 1.4.2 on the website:

http://santuario.apache.org/changes.html

1) Unnecessary namespace declarations on Signature children...See Issue 43597

(should be 42597)

2) Inclusive C14n doesn't always handle xml:space and xml:lang attributes correctly...See Issue 42230

(should be 43230)

3) Error when removing encrypted content in 1.4.1...See Issue 42866

(should be 42886)
creator: coheigea@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 23715
A patch for this issue.
